model

Class SimpleSentenceSolutionNode

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractSolutionNode
      • model.SimpleSentenceSolutionNode

  • public class SimpleSentenceSolutionNode
extends AbstractSolutionNode
    This class represents a simple sentence node in the tree of proof. A solution node is a node in a tree of proof.
    Author:
    Alexandre Camus

        public SimpleSentenceSolutionNode(SimpleSentence clause,
                          RuleSet rules,
                          SubstitutionSet parentSolution,
                          AbstractSolutionNode parentNode)
        Constructor of the class.
        Parameters:
        clause - the simple sentence to be proved by this subtree.
        rules - the rules representing context of the proof.
        parentSolution - the solution of the parent node in the tree of proof.

    • Method Detail

      • setType

        public void setType(int ruleIndex)
        Sets the type of the specified rule. The type is either "fact", "rule" or "action".
        Parameters:
        ruleIndex - the index in the set of rules, of the rule to type.

      • getType

        public String getType()
        Gets the type of the specified rule. The type is either "fact", "rule" or "action".
        Returns:
        the type this node.

      • reset

        protected void reset(SubstitutionSet newParentSolution,
         RuleSet newRuleSet)
        Resets the subtree to the new state of the database and resets all the counters that prevent from infinite evaluation of the node.
        Overrides:
        reset in class AbstractSolutionNode
        Parameters:
        newParentSolution - the new parent solution of the subtree.
        newRuleSet - the new state of the database.
        See Also:
        AbstractSolutionNode.reset(model.SubstitutionSet, model.RuleSet)

      • nextSolution

        public SubstitutionSet nextSolution()
        Creates the next solution for the simple sentence of the node. If no solution exists, it will create a solution. Otherwise it will get a different solution or return null if there no other different solution.
        Specified by:
        nextSolution in class AbstractSolutionNode
        Returns:
        a SubstitutionSet object representing the bindings of the next solution or null if there is no next solution.
        See Also:
        AbstractSolutionNode.nextSolution()

      • limitExceed

        public boolean limitExceed()
        Checks if the limit of waited cycles is exceeded or not.
        Returns:
        true if not.

      • limitUpdate

        public void limitUpdate()
        Updates the limit every cycle.
